mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.tushuqiugou_name as tushuqiugouName ,a.tushuqiugou_photo as tushuqiugouPhoto ,a.tushuqiugou_zuozhe as tushuqiugouZuozhe ,a.tushuqiugou_chubanshe as tushuqiugouChubanshe ,a.tushu_types as tushuTypes ,a.tushuqiugou_types as tushuqiugouTypes ,a.tushuqiugou_content as tushuqiugouContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM tushuqiugou a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.tushuqiugou_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.tushuqiugouName},'%')
and a.tushuqiugou_zuozhe like CONCAT('%',#{params.tushuqiugouZuozhe},'%')
and a.tushuqiugou_chubanshe like CONCAT('%',#{params.tushuqiugouChubanshe},'%')
and a.tushu_types = #{params.tushuTypes}
and a.tushuqiugou_types = #{params.tushuqiugouTypes}
and a.tushuqiugou_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.tushuqiugouContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
